title: People with MS urged to sign up for swimming classes (North Somerset District Council)
text: ( Source : North Somerset District Council ) â€‹ People living with multiple sclerosis in North Somerset are being invited to sign up for swimming classes which have been designed specifically for those with the condition. They've been organised
